function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on digital tools and remote work may lead to decreased attention to health and safety protocols on site, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Potential increase in the transmission of contagious diseases among on-site workers","Mitigation":"Mandatory training on health and safety protocols for remote workers, regular site inspections by health and safety experts","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and communication tools for virtual site inspections","People":"On-site construction workers","Owner":"Construction management"},{"Description":"Integration of new staff into the organization may pose a risk of disease transmission if proper onboarding protocols are not in place","Impact":"Potential introduction and spread of contagious diseases among existing staff","Mitigation":"Implement virtual onboarding processes, provide new staff with health and safety training, and conduct regular health screenings for new staff","Technologies":"Virtual onboarding platforms, health screening technology","People":"New staff, existing staff","Owner":"Human resources department"},{"Description":"Increased reliance on digital modeling and visualization tools may lead to decreased physical collaboration, potentially hindering effective problem-solving and communication","Impact":"Reduced ability for the BIM/Design team to effectively assist on-site workers with complex issues, leading to project delays or errors","Mitigation":"Scheduled virtual collaboration sessions, training on effective digital collaboration, and clear communication channels for problem-solving","Technologies":"Virtual collaboration platforms, augmented reality for remote assistance","People":"BIM/Design team, on-site workers","Owner":"Project management"}]}
